sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Button, Form, Modal, Spinner } from "react-bootstrap" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import AuthContext from "../../context/AuthContext" import ThemeContext from "../../context/ThemeContext" import Navbar from "../../components/Layout/Navbar" import Footer from "../../components/Layout/Footer" import { courseService, eventService, assignmentService, userService } from "../../services/api" const FacultyDashboard = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const { theme } = useContext(ThemeContext) const navigate = useNavigate() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]) const [events, setEvents] = useState([]) const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const [showEventModal, setShowEventModal] = useState(false) const [showAssignmentModal, setShowAssignmentModal] = useState(false) const [showAttendanceModal, setShowAttendanceModal] = useState(false) const [selectedCourse, setSelectedCourse] = useState(null) const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]) const [courseStudents, setCourseStudents] = useState([]) const [attendanceRecords, setAttendanceRecords] = useState([]) // Form states const [eventForm, setEventForm] = useState({ title: "", description: "", date: new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0], time: "12:00", location: "", }) const [assignmentForm, setAssignmentForm] = useState({ title: "", description: "", courseId: "", dueDate: new Date(Date.now() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString().split("T")[0], totalMarks: 100, }) useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { setLoading(true) try { // Fetch all data in parallel const [coursesResponse, eventsResponse, studentsResponse] = await Promise.all([ courseService.getCourses(), eventService.getEvents(), userService.getStudents(), ]) setCourses(coursesResponse.data) setEvents(eventsResponse.data) setStudents(studentsResponse.data) // Set default course for assignment form if courses exist if (coursesResponse.data.length > 0) { setAssignmentForm((prev) => ({ ...prev, courseId: coursesResponse.data[0]._id, })) } toast.success("Dashboard data loaded successfully") } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data:", error) toast.error("Failed to load dashboard data") } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleCreateEvent = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const eventData = { title: eventForm.title, description: eventForm.description, date: new Date(`${eventForm.date}T${eventForm.time}`), location: eventForm.location, } const response = await eventService.createEvent(eventData) setEvents([...events, response.data]) setShowEventModal(false) resetEventForm() toast.success("Event created successfully") } catch (error) { console.error("Error creating event:", error) toast.error("Failed to create event") } } const handleCreateAssignment = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const assignmentData = { title: assignmentForm.title, description: assignmentForm.description, courseId: assignmentForm.courseId, dueDate: new Date(assignmentForm.dueDate), totalMarks: Number.parseInt(assignmentForm.totalMarks), } await assignmentService.createAssignment(assignmentData) setShowAssignmentModal(false) resetAssignmentForm() toast.success("Assignment created successfully") } catch (error) { console.error("Error creating assignment:", error) toast.error("Failed to create assignment") } } const handleCourseSelect = async (courseId) => { setSelectedCourse(courseId) try { const response = await courseService.getCourseById(courseId) const courseWithStudents = response.data setCourseStudents(courseWithStudents.students || []) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching course students:", error) toast.error("Failed to fetch course students") } } const handleAttendanceDate = async () => { if (!selectedCourse) return try { // Check if attendance already exists for this date const response = await courseService.getCourseAttendance(selectedCourse, selectedDate) if (response.data && response.data.length > 0) { // Attendance exists, load it setAttendanceRecords(response.data[0].records) } else { // No attendance yet, initialize with all present const newRecords = courseStudents.map((student) => ({ student: student._id, studentName: student.name, status: "present", remark: "", })) setAttendanceRecords(newRecords) } setShowAttendanceModal(true) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching attendance:", error) toast.error("Failed to fetch attendance data") } } const handleMarkAttendance = async () => { if (!selectedCourse) return try { await courseService.markAttendance(selectedCourse, { date: selectedDate, records: attendanceRecords, }) setShowAttendanceModal(false) toast.success("Attendance marked successfully") } catch (error) { console.error("Error marking attendance:", error) toast.error("Failed to mark attendance") } } const handleAttendanceChange = (studentId, status) => { setAttendanceRecords( attendanceRecords.map((record) => (record.student === studentId ? { ...record, status } : record)), ) } const resetEventForm = () => { setEventForm({ title: "", description: "", date: new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0], time: "12:00", location: "", }) } const resetAssignmentForm = () => { setAssignmentForm({ title: "", description: "", courseId: courses.length > 0 ? courses[0]._id : "", dueDate: new Date(Date.now() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString().split("T")[0], totalMarks: 100, }) } if (loading) { return ( <>

Loading your dashboard...

) } return ( <>
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome, {user?.name}!

Faculty Dashboard

 {/* Main Content */} {/* Manage Courses Section */}
Manage Courses
 {courses.length > 0 ? ( courses.map((course) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Course Students Actions
{course.title} {course.students?.length || 0}
No courses found
{/* Manage Events Section */}
Manage Events
 {events.length > 0 ? ( events.map((event) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Event Date Actions
{event.title} {new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString()}
No events found
{/* Manage Students Section */}
Manage Students
 {students.length > 0 ? ( students.slice(0, 5).map((student) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Name Email Courses Actions
{student.name} {student.email} {student.courses?.length || 0}
No students found
{/* Create Event Modal */} setShowEventModal(false)} centered> Create New Event
Event Title setEventForm({ ...eventForm, title: e.target.value })} required /> Description setEventForm({ ...eventForm, description: e.target.value })} required /> Date setEventForm({ ...eventForm, date: e.target.value })} required /> Time setEventForm({ ...eventForm, time: e.target.value })} required /> Location setEventForm({ ...eventForm, location: e.target.value })} required />
{/* Create Assignment Modal */} setShowAssignmentModal(false)} centered> Create New Assignment
Assignment Title setAssignmentForm({ ...assignmentForm, title: e.target.value })} required /> Description setAssignmentForm({ ...assignmentForm, description: e.target.value })} required /> Course setAssignmentForm({ ...assignmentForm, courseId: e.target.value })} required > {courses.map((course) => ( ))} Due Date setAssignmentForm({ ...assignmentForm, dueDate: e.target.value })} required /> Total Marks setAssignmentForm({ ...assignmentForm, totalMarks: e.target.value })} required />
{/* Mark Attendance Modal */} setShowAttendanceModal(false)} centered size="lg"> Mark Attendance
Course handleCourseSelect(e.target.value)} required > {courses.map((course) => ( ))} Date setSelectedDate(e.target.value)} required /> {attendanceRecords.length > 0 ? ( attendanceRecords.map((record) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Student Status Remarks
{record.studentName} handleAttendanceChange(record.student, e.target.value)} > { setAttendanceRecords( attendanceRecords.map((r) => r.student === record.student ? { ...r, remark: e.target.value } : r, ), ) }} />
No students found in this course
) } export default FacultyDashboard
